Nicky Hoberman ( onye amụrụ n'afọ 1967) bụ onye amụrụ na South Africa, onye na-ese ihe na London nke ụdị ya gụnyere iji photorealism  tinyere njikotacaricature, na ọnụ ọgụgụ na-enweghị isi na ndabere nke oghere dị larịị, ọbụna oghere.
A mụrụ Nicky Hoberman na Cape Town, South Africa n'afọ 1967.  Ọ gara Worcester College of Oxford University site n'afọ 986 ruo 89, ebe ọ natara MA na Modern History
Site n'afọ 1989 ruo afọ 1993 ọ gara Parsons School of Design na Paris wee nweta BA na Fine Art
Na 1992 Hoberman gara Yale Summer School of Art na USA, wee nweta MA na eserese site na Chelsea College of Art and Design na London, ebe ọ gara site n'afọ 1994 ruo 1995.

Malite n'etiti afọ 1990, Hoberman enweela ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu tinyekwara nke onwe ya na United States, Italy, Switzerland, Germany, Belgium, New Zealand, na England. N'afọ 1996, a họpụtara ya maka 1996 New Contemporaries na Tate Liverpool E tinyekwara ya na ihe ngosi Saatchi "New Neurotic Realism" n'afọ 1998.  O sonyere na ihe ngosi otu na Museum of Contemporary Art, Chicago, Museum of Contemporary Art, Sydney, Melbourne National Gallery of Victoria na Magasin 3 na Stockholm
Hoberman enweela ihe ngosi atọ  ke naanị ya na Feigen Contemporary na New York.
